dmca.title: [EV1-C1225302P] Eminent Domain/Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx Legal Response Team -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Wednesday, October 04, 2006 12:37 PM Posted To: DMCA Houston Conversation: [EV1-C1225302P] Eminent Domain/Copyright Infringement Subject: [EV1-C1225302P] Eminent Domain/Copyright Infringement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Eminent Domain/Copyright Infringement Added by system at Wednesday, Oct 4 2006 04:36 pm X-MailFrom: barbbob613@nefcom.net X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [207.218.192.61] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Wed Oct 4 17:32:10 2006 Received: from SMTP32-FWD by mail.ev1.net (SMTP32) id A000007F4; Wed, 4 Oct 2006 17:31:14 -0500 Received: from trueband.net [216.163.120.10] by mail.ev1.net (SMTPD32-6.06) id A62BB879002A; Wed, 04 Oct 2006 17:31:10 -0500 Received: (qmail 23333 invoked by uid 1006); 4 Oct 2006 22:32:05 -0000 Received: from barbbob613@nefcom.net by rs0 by uid 1003 with qmail-scanner-1.16 (spamassassin: 3.1.4. Clear:SA:0(0.5/100.0):. Processed in 1.105982 secs); 04 Oct 2006 22:32:05 -0000 X-Spam-Status: No, hits=0.5 required=100.0 X-Spam-Level: Received: from unknown (HELO trueband.net) (172.16.0.16) by -v with SMTP; 4 Oct 2006 22:32:04 -0000 Received: (qmail 18224 invoked from network); 4 Oct 2006 22:32:03 -0000 Received: from unknown (HELO typhoon) (216.198.103.38) by -v with SMTP; 4 Oct 2006 22:32:03 -0000 Message-ID: <000a01c6e804$f5edbf70$6401a8c0@typhoon> Reply-To: "Robert Brookens" From: "Robert Brookens" To: Subject: Eminent Domain/Copyright Infringement Date: Wed, 4 Oct 2006 18:32:22 -0400 Organization: Hurricane Hollow Weather Corp MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_0005_01C6E7E3.6E70DA80" X-Priority: 3 X-MSMail-Priority: Normal X-Mailer: Microsoft Outlook Express 6.00.2900.2869 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.2962 X-Declude-Sender: barbbob613@nefcom.net [216.163.120.10] X-Spam-Tests-Failed: None [0] X-Note: This E-mail was sent from trueband.net ([216.163.120.10]). (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) To: EV1Servers October 3, 2006 835 Greens Parkway Suite 150 Houston, Texas 77067 From: Hurricane Hollow Weather Corp 7401 East Ridge Estates Drive Glen Saint Mary, FL 32040 (904) 563-4448 Dear EV1Servers, I own Hurricane Hollow Weather Corporation. We host and have been hosting through a number of servers over the past 4 1/2 years weather related broadcasts/webcasts called "The Barometer Bob Show" and "Hurricane Hollow's Eye on the Storm". We are the sole owners, producers, editors, and hosts of these internet based broadcasts. We also own the copyrights and intellectual property also refered to as emminant domain associated with these broadcasts/webcasts, which include images, recordings, domain names, ect. Based on the laws of the United States Copyright office, These shows are the property of Hurricane Hollow Weather and Robert Brookens. These recordings are a creation of , and have been produced by the above named. The recordings are the recorded voice of Robert Brookens (host), and the names of the host, sites owned by the host are mentioned throughout these broadcasts. These recordings have also been published on the internet. They have also been published on AM radio broadcasts protected under FCC regulations. Your company, EV1Servers own two servers located in Houston, Texas that are being leased to and operated by NHCWX Data Services, also known as Radio.NHCWX.Com, HurricaneProject.Com, IPR365.Com, Storm2K.Org, and other domains that may be listed within the servers. They also claim to be an affiliate with EV1Servers with your logo on their sites. The IP Adresses are: 216.127.92.122 66.98.250.79 66.98.250.79 66.98.251.192 And an unknown number of other IP Adresses. The person that leases the servers from EV!Servers and that owns and operates these domains is: Steve Oliver 203 James Court Winter Springs, Florida 32708 These servers are currently allowing for download past recordings of webcasts of the above mentioned shows. You can find the recordings here: http://www.radio.nhcwx.net/zina/index.php?p=InternetPartnershipRadioNetw ork/RadioNHCWX/Cancelled%20Shows/2004%20Season The owner(s) of NHCWX Data Services have been notified three times in the past to remove these recordings. This has been via email and phone. The owner(s) of NHCWX Data Services did not remove them, but moved them to another location on one of two servers they are hosting their domains on. This was to hide their exsistance on the servers. This shows intent, and shows their refusal to remove the said recordings. We have just learned the recordings are still on the servers and have never been removed. Also, they are using an image to sell merchandise which is also copyright protected under Hurricane Hollow Weather Corp, being it was produced for and published by our company. You can find the merchandise here: www.storm2k.org/wx/ sold via www.cafepress.com/storm2k.4893049 on this merchandise, you can clearly see this image www.hurricanehollow.org/images/hhwxlogo.gif which is owned by Hurricane Hollow Weather Corp. This is a notification to EV1Servers that the recordings and images on these servers leased to NHCWX Data Services, and that the servers be removed immediatly. Furthermore, any rebroadcast, transmission, or copies that have been made, sold for any reason should be deleted and/or returned to Hurricane Hollow Weather Corp. These include, copies that may be stored as backup on any other servers at EV1Servers. I am contacting your company directly in good faith. Your policy of copyright infringment is clear ( http://www.ev1servers.com/About/Aup.aspx ), and the owner(s) of NHCWX Data Services are aware of the consequenses of knowingly storing and allowing for download copyright protected material on your servers. Let alone using a copyright protected image on merchandise for sale for profit. We request that the servers in question be removed immediatly, and the harddrives be held as evidence for 120 days, for possible future legal actions against NHCWX Data Services. The harddrives would show in the statistics how many downloads have been peformed, ect. Otherwise, being this is a notification to EV1Servers in good faith, you could be held equally libel for allowing the recordings of past broadcasts/webcasts and images on merchandise to be downloaded and/or sold for profit, being EV1Servers is listed as an affiliate. Which Hurricane Hollow Weather Corp is receiving no compensation for. Again, this is a notification to EV1Servers of the copyright material on those servers. Notification has been made to Steve Oliver and NHCWX Data Services in the past, in which have been ignored. Any further notification to them would harm any efforts of ours to pursue gathering of evidence for further actions to recover any profits received by them or for damages concerning the copyright infringments by them. Including EV1Servers disclosing the nature of the copyright infringments. We are contacting other companies concerning other copyright infringement and the merchandise sales. Sincerely, Robert Brookens President Hurricane Hollow Weather Corp 7401 East Ridge Estates Drive Glen Saint Mary, Fl 32040 904-563-4448 MIME element (text/html)

To:

EV1Servers         ;             ;             ;             ;             ;             ;             ;             ;             ;  October 3, 2006

835 Greens Parkway Suite 150
Houston, Texas 77067

From:

Hurricane Hollow Weather Corp

7401 East Ridge Estates Drive

Glen Saint Mary, FL 32040

(904) 563-4448

Dear EV1Servers,

I own Hurricane Hollow Weather Corporation. We host and have been hosting through a number of servers over the past 4 1/2 years  weather related broadcasts/webcasts called "The Barometer Bob Show" and "Hurricane Hollow's Eye on the Storm". We are the sole owners, producers, editors, and hosts of these internet based broadcasts.

We also own the copyrights and intellectual property also refered to as emminant domain associated with these broadcasts/webcasts, which include images, recordings, domain names, ect.

Based on the laws of the United States Copyright office, These shows are the property of Hurricane Hollow Weather and Robert Brookens. These recordings are a creation of , and have been produced by the above named. The recordings are the recorded voice of Robert Brookens (host), and the names of the host, sites owned by the host are mentioned throughout these broadcasts. These recordings have also been published on the internet. They have also been published on AM radio broadcasts protected under FCC regulations.

Your company, EV1Servers own two servers located in Houston, Texas that are being leased to and operated by NHCWX Data Services, also known as Radio.NHCWX.Com, HurricaneProject.Com, IPR365.Com, Storm2K.Org, and other domains that may be listed within the servers. They also claim to be an affiliate with EV1Servers with your logo on their sites.

The IP Adresses are:

216.127.92.122

66.98.250.79

66.98.250.79

66.98.251.192

And an unknown number of other IP Adresses.

The person that leases the servers from EV!Servers and that owns and operates these domains is:

Steve Oliver

203 James Court

Winter Springs, Florida 32708

These servers are currently allowing for download past recordings of webcasts of the above mentioned shows. You can find the recordings here:

http://www.radio.n hcwx.net/zina/index.php?p=InternetPartnershipRadioNetwork/RadioNHCWX/Can celled%20Shows/2004%20Season

The owner(s) of NHCWX Data Services have been notified three times in the past to remove these recordings. This has been via email and phone.

The owner(s) of NHCWX Data Services did not remove them, but moved them to another location on one of two servers they are hosting their domains on. This was to hide their exsistance on the servers. This shows intent, and shows their refusal to remove the said recordings. We have just learned the recordings are still on the servers and have never been removed.

Also, they are using an image to sell merchandise which is also copyright protected under Hurricane Hollow Weather Corp, being it was produced for and published by our company. You can find the merchandise here:

 www.storm2k.org/wx/ sold via www.cafepress.com/storm2 k.4893049

on this merchandise, you can clearly see this image  www.hurricaneh ollow.org/images/hhwxlogo.gif  which is owned by Hurricane Hollow Weather Corp.

This is a notification to EV1Servers that the recordings and images on these servers leased to NHCWX Data Services, and that the servers be removed immediatly.

Furthermore, any rebroadcast, transmission, or copies that have been made, sold for any reason should be deleted and/or returned to Hurricane Hollow Weather Corp.

These include, copies that may be stored as backup on any other servers at EV1Servers.

I am contacting your company directly in good faith. Your policy of copyright infringment is clear ( http://www.ev1servers.com/About/Aup.aspx ), and the owner(s) of NHCWX Data Services are aware of the consequenses of knowingly storing and allowing for download copyright protected material on your servers. Let alone using a copyright protected image on merchandise for sale for profit.

We request that the servers in question be removed immediatly, and the harddrives be held as evidence for 120 days, for possible future legal actions against NHCWX Data Services. The harddrives would show in the statistics how many downloads have been peformed, ect.

Otherwise, being this is a notification to EV1Servers in good faith, you could be held equally libel for allowing the recordings of past broadcasts/webcasts and images on merchandise to be downloaded and/or sold for profit, being EV1Servers is listed as an affiliate. Which Hurricane Hollow Weather Corp is receiving no compensation for. Again, this is a notification to EV1Servers of the copyright material on those servers.

Notification has been made to Steve Oliver and NHCWX Data Services in the past, in which have been ignored. Any further notification to them would harm any efforts of ours to pursue gathering of evidence for further actions to recover any profits received by them or for damages concerning the copyright infringments by them. Including EV1Servers disclosing the nature of the copyright infringments. We are contacting other companies concerning other copyright infringement and the merchandise sales.

Sincerely,

Robert Brookens

President

Hurricane Hollow Weather Corp

7401 East Ridge Estates Drive

Glen Saint Mary, Fl 32040

904-563-4448

 MIME element (text/plain)
